Text:
Brothers and Sisters, if you had downloaded the previous version of the Holy Quran by Abdel Basset, then you do NOT need to download the new version. All you have to do is to correct the names of the following Sura's and everything will be up-to-date.

Major mistakes:
Sura 083: Al-Motafifeen
Sura 104: Al-Homazah
Sura 062: Al-Jomo3ah

Minor mistakes:
Sura 005: Al-Ma'idah
Sura 069: Al-7aqqah
Sura 072: Al-Jin
Sura 108: Al-Kawthar
Just downloaded, it works fine. Thank you.
